description:
Like the river its named after, this Sherpa fleece is ready to go with the flow. Wherever the day takes you, the Misstassini fleece will keep you warm and cozy. Made from a super soft, recycled Sherpa fleece, this top holds onto your natural warmth.

  • High-pile Sherpa fleece traps in warm air while wicking away moisture and drying quickly
  • Sorbtek® mesh lining enhances the fleece’s wicking properties and makes layering easier
  • Dual chest pockets and handwarmer pockets give you lots of room for essentials
  • Reinforced forearm panels offer enhanced durability in high-wear areas
  • Elasticized cuffs help keep the warm air in
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Relaxed fit leaves room to layer
name: Hooke Mistassini Sherpa Fleece Full Zip - Men's
